blogPost.excerpt: ⏱ 1Feed is built to keep you up to date, without being an addictive time sink. 🔎 Add anything to your 1Feed and stay updated across desktop and mobile. 🧘‍♂️ It’s your quiet place on the internet — where you can focus on the people and content you care about!
blogPost.body: ⏱ 1Feed is built to keep you up to date, without being an addictive time sink. 🔎 Add anything to your 1Feed and stay updated across desktop and mobile. 🧘‍♂️ It’s your quiet place on the internet — where you can focus on the people and content you care about!
blogPost.title: 1Feed - Stay up to date 10x faster, with 10x less dopamine 🧘‍♂️
blogPost.author: Ethan

localize.description: ⏱ 1Feed 的设计是为了让您了解最新的信息，而不是让您沉迷于时间。🔎 将任何内容添加到 1Feed 中，并在桌面和移动端保持更新。🧘♂️ 这是你在互联网上的安静之地--在这里你可以专注于你关心的人和内容!
localize.tagline: 🧘♂️以更少的多巴胺，以10倍的速度保持最新状态。

localize.description: ⏱ 1Feed 的設計是爲了讓您瞭解最新的信息，而不是讓您沉迷於時間。🔎 將任何內容添加到 1Feed 中，並在桌面和移動端保持更新。🧘♂️ 這是你在互聯網上的安靜之地--在這裏你可以專注於你關心的人和內容!
localize.tagline: 🧘♂️以更少的多巴胺，以10倍的速度保持最新狀態。
